title: About
content:
I am a self-taught polyglot programming with experience in multiple languages included C#, python, Java, ruby, golang and rust. Currently I’m a security consultant for Depth Security and have assisted with the CTF for BSidesKC for the past three years.
As an employee of Depth I help maintain several projects including armory, which was created to automate and assist with running multiple tools against targets and gathering the information within a database to easily create reports. I also help maintain a similar tool domained which was originally created by Caleb for Bug Bounties. However, the latter tool is mainly the command execution of some tools without storing the information in a database.
⚠ All of the opinions in these posts are my own and here for merely educational purposes. ⚠
